data.name: jy171019_A_idB
data.description: This morphology reconstruction of a mouse thalamus cell was provided by the Laboratory for Neural Microcircuitry https://www.epfl.ch/labs/markram-lab/ through a collaboration with BBP. This morphology was used in part or in whole to construct some of the cells used in the circuit of (Iavarone, et al., 2023) https://doi.org/10.1016/j.celrep.2023.112200 .

data.name: AA0318 in CCFv2.5
data.description: This is a morphology reconstruction of a mouse thalamus cell that was obtained from the Janelia Mouselight project http://ml-neuronbrowser.janelia.org/ and was used in part or in whole to construct some of the cells used in the circuit of (Iavarone, et al., 2023) https://doi.org/10.1016/j.celrep.2023.112200 .
